comment.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
In general please disable the non-required lists as they are already included in another enabled list:
EasyList
AdGuard Mobile App Banners
AdGuard Widgets
AdGuard Cookie Notices
AdGuard Other Annoyances
AdGuard Popups

2nd please try without DNS protection. Also you have enabled a lot of third-party filters which can cause such issues (Peter Lowe's Blocklist is known to cause issues). With AdGuard only filters I cannot reproduce.

Self-destructing third-party cookies (0) can also cause some issues.

comment.body:
Not reproduced this with our filters, `EasyList Czech and Slovak` with a Czech IP on my end.
Try to leave only them, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
